para: No changes have been made for GridFTP since 4.0.2. However, please remember that a protocol change was made in 4.0.1 to match a wuftpd extension regarding listings and resolve an issue with a function in the Java Cog Kit. This breaks technical protocol compatibility with RFC959 (FTP), but matches the behavior of 2.4.x servers. See Bug 3507 for details.
